channel.title: Website template
channel.description:
v1 [IMG]http://i765.photobucket.com/albums/xx291/rattygfx/hellgate-hybrid.png[/img] v2 [IMG]http://i765.photobucket.com/albums/xx291/rattygfx/hellgatev2-hybrid.png[/img] One thing I already noticed about v2 is the tabs at the top of the content boxes are not the same size. Will fix.
Hellgate london in the banner. (credits for the render goto: Adnan959 @ planetrenders.net) C&C please

item.title: Website template
item.dc:creator: @ravfe ravfe
item.description:
@ravfe wrote:

[quote=“SomethingToHide, post:5, topic:296528”][quote author=ravfe link=topic=392520.msg2922942#msg2922942 date=1250865542]
yeah, I haven’t put much into it yet. 72p/in is the resolution. To be honest, I had no idea what I was doing with the title, but I’ll try something new.
[/quote]

72 pixels per inch is not the resolution. Resolution is more commonly referred to as W x H. There’s no real consumer grade monitors with more than 72ppi. 150 and 300 ppi would be for printing crisp images.

So again, what resolution is it optimized for?[/quote]

arg my bad, 800x600 is the resolution.

Read full topic

item.title: Website template
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

ravfe:

yeah, I haven’t put much into it yet. 72p/in is the resolution. To be honest, I had no idea what I was doing with the title, but I’ll try something new.

72 pixels per inch is not the resolution. Resolution is more commonly referred to as W x H. There’s no real consumer grade monitors with more than 72ppi. 150 and 300 ppi would be for printing crisp images.

So again, what resolution is it optimized for?

Read full topic

item.title: Website template
item.dc:creator: @ravfe ravfe
item.description:
@ravfe wrote:

[quote=“Elijah, post:2, topic:296528”]fail watermark

There isn’t much to it, so not much to critique. I suggest you get some more done on it before you ask for some c&c, though you’re headed in the right direction. What resolution is it optimized for?

Tip: fix the title in the header, inner glow isn’t becoming of a site title.[/quote]
yeah, I haven’t put much into it yet. 72p/in is the resolution. To be honest, I had no idea what I was doing with the title, but I’ll try something new.

cane:

how are you going to cut the header with one of the renders being cut off at the edge?

Actually, thats where the render ended. I’m thinking i may fade the edge of the render to make it blend with the background to fix that problem.
Gonna take another go at it in a bit.

Read full topic
